translations.translation: Say: The earlier and the later peoples will certainly all be gathered
Say: "Indeed, the earlier and the later generations
Tell them, (O Prophet): “The earlier ones and the later ones
(Muhammad), say, "All the ancient and later generations
Proclaim, “Without doubt all – the former and the latter.”
Say: "(Yes) verily, those of old, and those of later times."
Say: The first and the last,
Say: 'The ancients, and the later folk
Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Lo! those of old and those of later time
Say, "Indeed, the earlier ones and the later ones
Say thou: verily the ancients and those of later generations:
Say, ‘Indeed the former and latter generations
Say: "Yea, those of old and those of later times,
Say (O Muhammad SAW): "(Yes) verily, those of old, and those of later times.
Say: 'Those of ancient times and those of later times
Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
[56:49] Say: ‘Truly the former and the later [generations]
(Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Lo! those of old and those of later time

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قُلْ } يا أكمل الرسل بعدما بالغوا في الإنكار والعناد: { إِنَّ ٱلأَوَّلِينَ وَٱلآخِرِينَ } [الواقعة: 49] أي: الأسلاف والأخلاف { لَمَجْمُوعُونَ } مجتمعون بكمال قدرة الله وحكمته { إِلَىٰ مِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ } [الواقعة: 50] أي: إلى وقت معين، ويوم موعود معهود، عينه الله سبحانه في حضرة علمه ولوح قضائه، لا بدَّ وأن يقع في ذلك الوقت ألبتة، بلا خلف

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ثم ردّ عليهم بقوله: { قل إِنّ الأولين والآخِرين } أي: إنّ الأولين من الأمم المتقدمين، الذين من جملتهم آباؤكم، والآخرين، الذين من جملتهم أنتم
